text.value: Government veterinary/Livestock field officer delivers animal health services in the village/street
Private veterinary/Livestock field officer delivers animal health services in the village/street
Animal Community Health Worker available in the village/street
NGO/CBO supporting provision of animal health services available in the village/street
Mention the NGO/CBO supporting provision of animal health services
Remember to put NGO/CBO in bracket eg SACIDS (NGO)
1st three latters of District, followed by namba, eg KAG01
How long have you lived in this area
What type of livestock do you own
Please specify other animals kept and how many
for each animal, write number in brackets separate by coma, eg hare(9), kangaroo(4)
Do you keep livestock disease records?
What information do you usually record about livestock disease events?
Number of sick livestock in the herd
Please, list other Information recorded on animal disease events
Where do you keep records on livestock disease events?
Where you keep records on livestock disease events, apart from listed ones
Actions related to notification in an event of livestock diseases
Who do you usually prefer to notify if your animal fall sick/die?
(Please, tick ONLY three actions USUALLY practiced
Share the case with other livestock keepers/neighbours
Practices other than notification for sick livestock: Besides notification; what other steps would you take/have taken if your livestock fall sick
I try to work out what is wrong with it myself and attempt to manage the case on my own using traditional medicine
I try to work out what is wrong with it myself and attempt to manage the case on my own using modern drugs from veterinary drug shops
Sell out at the alive animal market
Kill it by yourself and sell the meat at a market
Slaughter and take the hide/skin to sell it later
Slaughter/kill and give the carcass to dogs
Do nothing and wait for any outcome
Actions related to notification in an event of livestock diseases
Please mention other Practices other than notification for sick livestock: Besides notification; what other steps would you take/have taken if your livestock fall sick
Practices other than notification for died livestock: Besides notification; what other steps would you take/have taken if your livestock fall sick
Sell the meat at a market
Take the hide/skin to sell it later
Throw away to a river or elsewhere
Actions related to notification in an event of livestock diseases
Please mention other Practices other than notification for dead livestock: Besides notification; what other steps would you take/have taken if your livestock fall sick
What do you usually take into account in deciding who to consult on disease event?
Actions related to notification in an event of livestock diseases
Please mention other decision who to consult on disease events
How do/would you notify higher level/others on disease events?
If livestock keeper reports animal health events to higher level
Sending out report through public transport
I do/would not make any notification
Actions related to notification in an event of livestock diseases
Other ways of How do/would you notify higher level/others on disease events?
What factors influence you to report disease events?
Satisfied with veterinary services in my area including immediate response/feedback
Veterinary service being close to my home
Money spent on veterinary services is offset by savings in production losses
Disease affecting both animals and humans
Other livestock keepers keeping to reporting
Actions related to notification in an event of livestock diseases
Other factors influence you to report disease events
What are the limiting factors for you to report disease events?
Health care services not available in my area
Lack of response/feedback/support when I report an event
Response/feedback being made late when I report an event
Livestock health care service providers in my area being difficult to consult
Veterinary drug shop is within my vicinity
Scared to have my animals culled as a result
Control measures would restrict animal movements and trade
Traditional herbs are effective over the modern drugs
Have skills and confidence to recognize and manage livestock cases on my own
Is what my neighbours/fellow livestock keepers are doing
Not explicitly aware to whom I should report
Not explicitly aware when I should report
Not able to detect/recognize disease events in my herd
Not aware on how I should record disease events
Actions related to notification in an event of livestock diseases
Other limiting factors for you to report disease events
If there is an easy way to inform veterinary officers, you might inform them?
I do not want veterinary services to be informed
Actions related to notification in an event of livestock diseases
Please explain why would you not inform vet officers if there was an easy way to report?
Which of the following would you prefer to report to livestock health care service provider when it occurs in your herd?
Theft/disappearance of animal in the herd
Actions related to notification in an event of livestock diseases
what are other options would you prefer to report to livestock health care service provider

veterinary/livestock field officer not available in my area
Can manage my livestock on my own
veterinary services in my area been not useful
The associated costs are higher for me to manage
Never experienced the challenge with my livestock necessitating to seek for veterinary services

Smart phone (check for functionalities such as, internet, emails, browsing, apps like whatsapp)

If you have chicken/duck/other birds, decision making on these birds is done by a family member who is:

Disease prevention practices: Some diseases are infectious, vaccination before disease season may save your animals. So, if you know what kind of vaccination is planned by season may help you safe-guarding your animals/birds.
Do you like to know information about animal/bird vaccination schedule in your area?
why don’t yo want to vaccinate your animals/birds? Please explain
What are the best ways to inform you about vaccination for livestock?

please list the ways of information sharing, with priority (what is the option if veterinary service cannot come to visit you just to inform about vaccination as they have limited funds for fuel/vehicle/man power…) Please explain:
What you think is a good / best idea to protect your animals/ animals in your village from animal diseases? Please explain
